author: Ryan Daws
description:
Android developers may soon benefit from a new set of commercial rules following a likely settlement between Epic Games and Google. After years of contentious litigation, Epic Games and Google have reached a “comprehensive settlement” and are now jointly asking the US District Court to approve a new framework for app distribution and in-app billing. […]

The post Google vs Epic Games: New rules for Android developers inbound appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google vs Epic Games: New rules for Android developers inbound
